node.statement: CHAIN RULE (ADMITTED from fisher_proof). Let r = p boxplus_n q with roots nu_1 < ... < nu_n. There exist subordination functions omega_1, omega_2 (algebraic of degree n, Herglotz) with G_r(z) = G_p(omega_1(z)) = G_q(omega_2(z)). At roots of r: (a) omega_1(nu_k) = lambda_{sigma(k)}, omega_2(nu_k) = mu_{tau(k)} for bijections sigma,tau. (b) omega_1'(nu_k) = omega_2'(nu_k) = 1. (c) H_r(nu_k) = H_p(lambda_{sigma(k)}) - alpha_k = H_q(mu_{tau(k)}) - beta_k where alpha_k = omega_1''(nu_k)/2, beta_k = omega_2''(nu_k)/2.
